reviewText: Purchased this for my husband.  Before I knew it , he was painting and it was amazing how much he learned from these 13 episodes.  He said it was very easy to follow the directions and I am amazed!
Waste of money.  She talks too fast and doesn't give specific instructions.  Not a step by step DVD.  She starts out with a drawing already on the canvas.  This DVD set is not for beginners.
